## Annotated Sample (n = 20)

A random sample (seed = 99, n = 20) drawn from the 70,655 Phase 2 rows, annotated by **DeepSeek v3.2-speciale** (temperature 0.3, reasoning effort = medium). This sample was not used during prompt development and serves as an unseen sanity check of annotation format and consistency. It is not a gold-standard accuracy evaluation; all production results will require human verification.

::: {.callout-note}
## Reproducibility
This sample is fully reproducible from the Phase 2 extraction CSV using random seed 99. Re-running the sampling script with the same seed will produce identical rows.
:::

::: {.callout-tip}
## Interactive Table
Click column headers to sort, use the search box to filter, or scroll to browse. Key annotation columns are shown below; expand "Full Data" for all columns.
:::

```{python}
#| label: pi-review-table
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore", module="itables")

import pandas as pd
from itables import show

df = pd.read_csv("../reports/phase3/phase3_pi_review_results.csv")

# Select key columns for the review table
display_cols = [
    "Utterance",
    "Determiner/Numbers",
    "Classifier",
    "Speaker_Role",
    "age_years",
    "determiner_type",
    "identified_noun",
    "conventional_classifier_zh",
    "classifier_type",
    "overuse_of_ge",
    "flag_for_review",
    "flag_reason",
    "rationale",
]

df_display = df[display_cols].copy()
df_display.columns = [
    "Utterance",
    "Det/Num",
    "CL",
    "Speaker",
    "Age (yr)",
    "Det Type",
    "Noun",
    "Conv. CL",
    "CL Type",
    "Overuse?",
    "Flag?",
    "Flag Reason",
    "Rationale",
]

show(
    df_display,
    paging=False,
    ordering=True,
    scrollX=True,
    classes="display compact nowrap",
    style="font-size: 0.8rem;",
)
```

## Sample Summary

```{python}
#| label: sample-summary

n = len(df)
n_overuse = int((df["overuse_of_ge"].astype(str).str.lower() == "true").sum())
n_omitted = int((df["identified_noun"] == "OMITTED").sum())
n_specific = int((df["classifier_type"] == "Specific").sum())
n_general = int((df["classifier_type"] == "General").sum())
n_child = int((df["Speaker_Role"] == "Target_Child").sum())

| Overuse of 个 detected | {n_overuse} |
| Flagged for review | {n_flagged} |
| OMITTED nouns | {n_omitted} |
| General classifier (个) | {n_general} |
| Specific classifier | {n_specific} |
| Target child utterances | {n_child} |

:::
""")
```

## Column Reference

| Column | Source | Description |
|--------|--------|-------------|
| `File Name` | Phase 2 (SQL) | CHILDES corpus file path |
| `Collection_Type` | Phase 2 (SQL) | CHILDES collection name |
| `Speaker_Code` | Phase 2 (SQL) | Speaker code from CHILDES (CHI, MOT, FAT, etc.) |
| `Speaker_Role` | Phase 2 (SQL) | Speaker role from CHILDES metadata. **Target_Child** = focal child being studied; **Child** = non-target child (sibling, peer); other roles = adults present. |
| `Age` | Phase 2 (SQL) | Target child's age in days at time of recording (CHILDES transcript metadata). This is always the focal child's age, even when the speaker is an adult. |
| `Utterance` | Phase 2 (SQL) | Full utterance from CHILDES |
| `%gra` | Phase 2 (SQL) | POS tag sequence for the utterance |
| `Determiner/Numbers` | Phase 2 (SQL) | The numeral/determiner/demonstrative preceding the classifier |
| `Classifier` | Phase 2 (SQL) | The classifier token |
| `utterance_id` | Phase 2 (SQL) | Unique utterance ID from childes-db |
| `utterance_order` | Phase 2 (SQL) | Position of utterance within transcript |
| `classifier_token_order` | Phase 2 (SQL) | Token position of classifier in utterance |
| `transcript_id` | Phase 2 (SQL) | Unique transcript ID from childes-db |
| `determiner_type` | Computed | Semantic type: demonstrative, numeral, interrogative, ordinal, quantifier |
| `age_years` | Computed | Age in decimal years (age_days / 365.25) |
| `age_available` | Computed | Whether age metadata exists |
| `Classifier type` | LLM (Phase 3) | Legacy column; use `classifier_type` instead |
| `Over use of Ge...` | LLM (Phase 3) | Legacy column; use `overuse_of_ge` instead |
| `identified_noun` | LLM (Phase 3) | The noun modified by the classifier, or OMITTED |
| `conventional_classifier` | LLM (Phase 3) | Standard adult classifier for this noun (pinyin) |
| `conventional_classifier_zh` | LLM (Phase 3) | Standard adult classifier (Simplified Chinese) |
| `classifier_type` | LLM (Phase 3) | General (个) or Specific |
| `overuse_of_ge` | LLM (Phase 3) | True if 个 was used where a specific classifier is conventional |
| `rationale` | LLM (Phase 3) | One-sentence explanation of the judgment |
| `flag_for_review` | LLM (Phase 3) | True if the row should be verified by a human reviewer |
| `flag_reason` | LLM (Phase 3) | Reason code: colloquial_tolerance, disputed_convention, implicit_noun_inference, or multi_instance_disambiguation |
